docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Several weeks ago Michael Deaver, the former Presidential adviser, in need of money to pay his legal bills, held a tag sale of his office furnishings. Last weekend John Connally, a former Governor of Texas in need of money to pay an army of creditors, consigned his worldly goods to auction. Mr. Deaver got about $100,000 from his sale.

docs.snippet: LEAD: After a two-year battle over a court desegregation order that has left Yonkers a divided city, local officials and the plaintiffs yesterday agreed on a plan to build low-income housing in mostly white neighborhoods....
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: After a two-year battle over a court desegregation order that has left Yonkers a divided city, local officials and the plaintiffs yesterday agreed on a plan to build low-income housing in mostly white neighborhoods.

headline.main: Yonkers, Ending 2-Year Battle, Agrees to Low-Income Housing

docs.snippet: LEAD: ''WHO IS PEARL HARBOR?'' SALLY White asks in Woody Allen's ''Radio Days.'' Sally's big break as a radio actress has been abruptly terminated by the announcement that the Japanese have attacked the United States naval base on Oahu. One minute...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''WHO IS PEARL HARBOR?'' SALLY White asks in Woody Allen's ''Radio Days.'' Sally's big break as a radio actress has been abruptly terminated by the announcement that the Japanese have attacked the United States naval base on Oahu. One minute before air time, Sally's debut performance has been canceled to make way for a special news broadcast.

docs.snippet: LEAD: JAMES CLAUDE WRIGHT JR., the Speaker of the House, is perfectly happy to bask in the glow of a historic moment, but he is not one to waste time on social small talk. So when he arrived at the White House for the state dinner last month honor...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: JAMES CLAUDE WRIGHT JR., the Speaker of the House, is perfectly happy to bask in the glow of a historic moment, but he is not one to waste time on social small talk. So when he arrived at the White House for the state dinner last month honoring Mikhail S. Gorbachev, the Texan was determined to catch the ear of a ranking Soviet official and promote his views of the Central American peace process.

byline.original: By Steven V. Robert; Steven V. Roberts, who formerly covered Congress for The Times, is now a White House correspondent

docs.snippet: LEAD: A Federal judge declared a mistrial yesterday in the nine-month-old racketeering and drug trial of Gene Gotti and nine co-defendants. The judge said the Government's allegations of jury tampering had persuaded him such a move was needed....
